quote: Do the thing and you will have the power.
To know what you want to draw, you must begin to draw.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Speed of iteration always beats quality of iteration.
author: John Boyd

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The ones who put themselves in the line as a way of life learn much faster than the ones that are protecting their egos.
author: Josh Waitzkin
